name: Ashis Chakraborty
title: Frontend Developer | Angular Expert
summary: Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience in MEAN stack development specializing in building scalable, high-performance, and secure web applications.
Strong expertise in Agile methodology, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver efficient, user-centric solutions in fast-paced environments.
A proactive problem solver with a keen eye for UI/UX optimization, performance tuning, and deployment automation to enhance product efficiency.
Experienced in streamlining development workflows, improving system reliability, and ensuring seamless CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery.
Passionate about bridging the gap between development and operations, ensuring efficient deployments, monitoring, and performance optimization.

description: Developed responsive web applications, ensuring cross-platform compatibility.
Engineered real-time dashboards with RESTful APIs, improving data accessibility.
Improved data accessibility through custom dashboards & real-time reporting features.
Optimized application performance, reducing load time by up to 40%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, automating deployment & testing workflows.
Collaborated with teams to design scalable solutions, enhancing user engagement.
Conducted comprehensive testing & validation to ensure system robustness.
Worked on AI-enabled B2B cloud applications and data analysis.
Developed frontend components using React.js and GraphQL.
Implemented data visualization features for financial analytics.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver product features.

projects.title: Foresite Edge Device Management
projects.description: A web-based platform to manage IoT devices efficiently.
details: Developed a responsive web application for managing IoT devices in the oil and gas industry.
Implemented real-time monitoring dashboards to track device performance and status.
Created user-friendly interfaces for device configuration and management.
Integrated with backend APIs to fetch and update device data.
Implemented authentication and authorization features for secure access.
Optimized application performance for handling large datasets.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver a scalable solution.

Optimized dashboard performance for handling large datasets.
